title: The Tryal and condemnation of several notorious malefactors at a sessions of Oyer and Terminer which began at the sessions house in the Old Baily with the names of those who received sentence of death, burnt in the hand, transported, and to be whipt, and most remarkably of John Sadler who whipt the child to death at Racliffe.
author: England and Wales. Court of Oyer and Terminer and Gaol Delivery (London and Middlesex).
